title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to ensure that needs of pregnant and parenting teenagers are addressed by the education system, and for other purposes.
content: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to specify requirements with respect to pregnant teenagers, teenage parents, and the children of such teenagers for: (1) Even Start programs. (2) secondary school programs for basic skills improvement and dropout prevention and reentry, (3) local targeted assistance programs, (4) State and local drug abuse education and prevention programs, (5) assistance to address school dropout problems, and (6) assistance to provide basic skills improvement.
